Name: Barolo Boscareto
Wine Description: The color is deep garnet red with orange reflections accented with shades of pink and purple. Intense and persistent, ethereal with notes of fruit and dried flowers. It has evident aromas of sweet spice, toast and leather. Of remarkable structure, enhances tannins but remain soft and pleasant with typical austerity; full-bodied and very charming.

Name: Olivet Lane Pinot Noir
Wine Description: A gorgeous pinot with depth. Complex, with layers of cassis, boysenberry and rose petals. Seamless texture. Impressive

Name: Vieilles Vignes Chassagne-Montrachet Rouge
Wine Description: An oaky nose and also on the palate. This has more texture and sweetness than the Maranges, it has round and silky textured fruit, very juicy. A very good value and a nice Pinot expression.

Name: Royal Punishers Petite Sirah
Wine Description: N/A

Name: TD9
Wine Description: Vibrant, complex aromas of ripe red and black fruit, lavender, and herbs fill the glass followed by pure, energetic flavors of dried cherry, blackberry, strawberry, licorice, and cocoa all pulled together with wet slate minerality, clean acidity, and ripe, seamless tannins.

Name: Canary Hill Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Larigi Langhe Rosso
Wine Description: Color: very dense purple red Nose: intense small red fruits, very persistent Taste: warm, soft, intense, with silky tannins, pleasantly acidity, red berries

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Two Blondes Vineyard Red
Wine Description: The bouquet is outstanding, bringing to mind black plums, dark currants, coffee, a touch of menthol, cigar smoke, and fresh herbs. The palate features a stunning combination of complexity, structure and balance that finishes with a tangy, energetic lengthiness.

Name: Pinot Noir Bourgogne
Wine Description: Ripe and expressive nose of dark berries, earth and softly spiced plum. There is a textured mouth feel to the admirably well-concentrated middle weight flavors that possess equally ripe supporting tannins, all wrapped in a balanced, lingering and only mildly rustic finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This approachable Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon offers up notes of cherries, pomegranate, cranberry, dried herbs, crushed rocks, with hints of espresso and cocoa beans, all wrapped up and supported by fresh acidity and supple tannins.

Name: Dagromis Barolo
Wine Description: Intense red. Nose of mixed aromatic herbs and spices underlining the delicate notes of rose, leading to aromas of anise and wild fennel. Solid structure and a rich softness as well as a lingering finish.

Name: Mineral Springs Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Bourgogne Passetoutgrains
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Marsannay 'Les Longeroies'
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pegaso Granito
Wine Description: Floral bouquet with star anise, wild strawberry and mulberry fruit all showing fine definition and distinction. The palate is well-balanced with fleshy, quite intense red berries (red currant, pomegranate and loganberry) on the entry, and fine tannins with a bitter edge towards the finish.

Name: Pomerol
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Savigny-les-Beaune 1er Cru 'La Dominode'
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Geyserville
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Nina Lee
Wine Description: This wine has black cherry and pepper notes with hints of violet. There is also a meaty characteristic. It is very rich and seamless with a long and earthy finish.

Name: Pagodes de Cos
Wine Description: The joy and spontaneity of moments shared with loved ones. An impromptu lunch with friends is the perfect occasion to open a bottle of Pagodes de Cos. It is reminiscent of the simple pleasures of life, like homemade blackcurrant syrup, a bowl of just-picked red cherries or a freshly opened jar of citrus jam. Pagodes de Cos is at once indulgent, comforting and vivacious, like a carefree conversation with family or friends in a familiar place.

Name: Zinfandel
Wine Description: Wine, which offers up a dense ruby/purple color and a big, sweet kiss of licorice, barbecue smoke, charcoal, steak tartare, pepper and Provençal herbs.

Name: Saint-Estèphe
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Legend Proprietary Red
Wine Description: Aromatics: Hints of dark, blue forest fruits, spice, tobacco

Name: Barolo
Wine Description: Garnet-edged rich ruby color. Pleasurable, generous, and evolved, hinting of violets and dried rose petals bouquet.Dry, full, and robust; lean-structured and sinewy, but smooth and harmonious Palate.

Name: Clos de Betz
Wine Description: Gentle and creamy in the mouth with harmonious ripe acidity framing the sweet red berry, cherry and cocoa powder flavors.

Name: Pinot Noir Mitsuko's Vineyard
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Montepulciano d'Abruzzo Riparosso
Wine Description: N/A

Name: La Villa Langhe Rosso
Wine Description: Color: very intense ruby red Nose: intense aromas of plums and berries, but also of rose petals Taste: fresh red fruits, well balanced tannins and with a pleasant acidity due to the barbera

Name: Margaux (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Sancerre Belle Dame
Wine Description: It is makes up this cuvée de Sancerre is harvested by hand and harvest is 100% scraped After maceration and fermentation in barrels, the wine is aged one year in oak barrels. His red and deep color opens with a nose of black cherries, stewed blackberries and currant and praline. The palate is sweet, slightly spicy with fine tannins and a silky finish. To taste a duck or dried dung Chavignol.

Name: Janzen Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It opens with a waft of tropical coconut before delving classically into smooth black cherry, cranberry and licorice, the tannins still monstrous and the oak packing a punch.

Name: Rim Rock Vineyard Syrah
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Arborina Barolo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Barbera d'Alba Cerretta
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: It has ruby red with garnet hints of cherry, violet and red fruits. Great finesse in the mouth with tannins. It displays high quality and long ageing potential.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Lifted with bing cherry, red plum and pomegranate. Notes of framboise, dried earth and savory herb can also be found. Powerful mid-palate with tannic grip and texture that is also graceful but rich. Flavours of strawberry and violets coat the palate. The finish is focused, long and structured.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Taurasi
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pomerol
Wine Description: N/A

Name: As Caborcas Single Vineyard
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Ruby red, oily red wine with a dark core, an inviting open bouquet which reminds one of wild berries, aromatic spices and has a complex fruity structure. The finish is fruity warm and long-lingering. Perfect company for matured cheese, chocolate and desserts or just to relax.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This wine is a deep garnet color with complex fruitand herbal character. The aromas of black currant, cherry and green olives are balanced with a complex bouquet.

Name: Marsannay 'Les Longeroies'
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Bandol Rouge
Wine Description: A deep ruby color. Aromas of dark fruit. Intense smooth tannins. After 5 or 6 years of aging, the wine will develop notes of leather, forest-floor and small red fruit.

Name: Campbell Ranch Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This vineyard is located a few miles from the Pacific Ocean, near the tiny town of Annapolis, and is farmed by Steve Campbell. At approximately 750 feet above sea level, it sits right at the boundary of the marine layer, ensuring that the cool, coastal climate delays ripening well beyond the warmer vineyards to the east. The fourteen-year-old vines grow on sandy, low-vigor Goldridge soil, which helps reduce yields to near two tons per acre.

Name: Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The fruit spans across the broad palate, matched by espresso, vanilla, and anise. The tannins are dense and fleshy, effortlessly supporting the rich, full body and suggesting a long life.

Name: Lussac Saint-Émilion
Wine Description: Deep red colour has hints of dark ripe fruit and cinnamon on the nose. These spicy flavours come through on a lively palate and only add to a long pleasing finish.

Name: Gattinara
Wine Description: Intense aromas suggest violet, rose, perfumed berry, leather and spice, with balsamic notes. The focused palate delivers sour cherry, crushed raspberry, leather, mineral and white pepper alongside polished tannins.

Name: Caiarossa
Wine Description: The nose of this wine offers a whirl of aromas ranging from hints of caramel to small red forest fruit and notes of spice, rich balsamic and deep minerals. The mouth confirms the lightness and elegance found on the nose and the tannins are alive and compact.

Name: Block 8 Pinot Noir (Bien Nacido Vineyard)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Hayne Vineyard Petite Sirah
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Lussac Saint-Émilion
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Savigny-lès-Beaune 1er Cru 'La Dominode'
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Peterson Family Vineyard Merlot
Wine Description: A rich and powerful with dark cherries, blackberry compote and exotic spice. Juicy, ripe and lush on the palate, framed by ample tannin structure and a long, elegant finish with a hint of chocolate and vanilla bean on the end.

Name: Castel Campan Merlot
Wine Description: It has dark purple red with a delicate of aromas embracing dark berry fruits, cedar wood with hints of tobacco. On the palate it shows power, concentration and impressive structure underpinned by ripe, mellow but assertive tannins and an elegant wine with impressive length.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: The color is a medium darkness with a strong tinge of purple. Some floral notes on the mouth, can be highly tannic.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Blend 24
Wine Description: Bold in flavor and offers a creative twist on a Super Tuscan style wine. The aromatics offer a refined display of blue fruits, strawberry jam, and floral notes; leading to a ripe palate of rich, dark fruits that is layered and lingering. Great balance, vibrant acidity and refined tannins

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of coffee and dark berries with hints of bay leaf carry through onto the palate. Firm tannins build alongside flavors of ripe plum fruit, sweet toffee and creamy oak in this classic Napa Cabernet.

Name: Shea Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Dark raspberry, dried rose, shortbread, and a broad, sweet perfume nose that is almost startling. Once on the palate, the density and richness fills your mouth with concentrated fruit, loads of spice, and a piercing, tangy richness of flavor and acidity that confirms this is no ordinary wine.

Name: Defiant
Wine Description: Defiant offers violet aromas, bold blackberry flavor and undertones of earth and cracked black pepper.

Name: Pauillac de Latour
Wine Description: This wine is very fruity and refined with blackberry and fine tannins. Medium to full body with a clean finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Franschhoek
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Malleolus
Wine Description: Color ripe cherry, background covered with thin layer garnet rim. The nose is a very intense black fruit wine which dominates jam, balsamic and aromatic woods. Equally stand spicy aromas of cloves and coffee, clay minerals touches. The palate is powerful and concentrated great balance. Retronasal appear again spicy, black fruit and aromatic woods. The palate is velvety and excellent integration between fruit and wood.

Name: Mas La Plana Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Marquis de Mons Margaux
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Garmón
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Stags Leap District Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Enticing aromas of crushed blackberries and cassis are complemented by dark chocolate and grilled rib-eye. Black licorice, cocoa powder, and espresso add complexity to this opulent wine. Exceptional concentration and a rich mouthfeel create a powerful impression that finishes with polished tannins and a Graves-like minerality, a hallmark of Stags Leap District vineyards.

Name: Volnay 1er Cru 'Clos d'Audignac' (Monopole)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Beaune Theurons
Wine Description: It has an aromatic bouquet, full body and ample structure with generous fruit flavours and an unusual delicacy on the palate, culminating in a lingering finish. Beaune Theurons is a balanced wine, not too rich but delicate and with very good tannins. It will perfectly accompany delicate meat dishes as well as most cheeses

Name: Estate Grown Merlot
Wine Description: It displays beautiful blueberry and floral notes underscored by fresh red berry and pomegranate elements. It has intensity of soft integrated tannins and bright acidity.

Name: Ca'Marcanda Promis Toscana
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Luxurious dark cherry, boysenberry, blackcurrant and black fig aromas, with scents of oak toast and dark chocolate. The wine’s vibrant acidity, supple, seamlessly integrated tannins and impeccable balance contribute to a round, plush mouthfeel, leading to a long, savoury finish marrying rich boysenberry fruit. French oak spice and a hint of dark chocolate.

Name: Double Diamond Oakville Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Double Diamond, from the producers of Schrader, opens with layered, intriguing aromas of black currants, dark cherries, blackberry, cherry compote, toast and oak spice. The notes of herbs, pine cone and dried earth. In the mouth, the palate is rich and juicy, bursting with big, rich flavor.

Name: Cornas
Wine Description: It is quite a full red colour shows floral notes, along with pepper, a tender black fruit.the palate presents good cornas typicity there is a clear mineral influence in the cool fruit there is enjoyable mid-palate fruit of easy purpose.good poise and style here is an unpretentious natural wine

Name: Ca'Marcanda Magari
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: A stellar example of why Rutherford Hill is king of the Merlot world, its rich with aromas of berries and cocoa. Flavors of dark cherries and chocolate abound in this soft and fleshy, balanced Merlot.
